meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'arse', meaning the buttocks or rear end.
meanings.sent1: She fell down and landed right on her arses.
meanings.sent2: The toddler giggled while trying to balance on his arses.
meanings.sent3: Carrying heavy bags made her appreciate the cushioning of her arses.
meanings.sent4: The cat's tail puffed up, resembling a fluffy arses.
meanings.sent5: The icy bench sent a shiver through her arses.

meanings.definition: Used as an informal and vulgar way to express annoyance or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Arses! I forgot my keys again.
meanings.sent2: He stubbed his toe and yelled, 'Arses!'
meanings.sent3: Arses, the rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: The printer jammed at the worst time, arses!
meanings.sent5: Arses! The traffic is at a standstill.
